TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ExifInterface extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: This is a class for reading and writing Exif tags in various image file formats.

Docs.param: the file of the image data

Docs.summary: Reads Exif tags from the specified image file.

Docs.summary: Returns parsed #TAG_DATETIME_DIGITIZED value, or -1 if unavailable or invalid.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance float64 GetAltitude(float64 defaultValue) cil managed
abstract member GetAltitude : double -> double override this.GetAltitude : double -> double

Docs.param: the value to return if the tag is not available.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetAttribute(string tag) cil managed
abstract member GetAttribute : string -> string override this.GetAttribute : string -> string

Docs.summary: Returns the value of the specified tag or null if there is no such tag in the image file.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance unsigned int8[] GetAttributeBytes(string tag) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the raw bytes for the value of the requested tag inside the image file, or null if the tag is not contained.
Docs.returns: raw bytes for the value of the requested tag, or null if no tag was found.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual double GetAttributeDouble (string tag, double defaultValue);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance float64 GetAttributeDouble(string tag, float64 defaultValue) cil managed
abstract member GetAttributeDouble : string * double -> double override this.GetAttributeDouble : string * double -> double

Docs.param: the value to return if the tag is not available.
Docs.summary: Returns the double value of the tag that is specified as rational or contains a double-formatted value.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual int GetAttributeInt (string tag, int defaultValue);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 GetAttributeInt(string tag, int32 defaultValue) cil managed
abstract member GetAttributeInt : string * int -> int override this.GetAttributeInt : string * int -> int

Docs.param: the value to return if the tag is not available.
Docs.summary: Returns the integer value of the specified tag.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int64[] GetAttributeRange(string tag) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the offset and length of the requested tag inside the image file, or null if the tag is not contained.
Docs.returns: two-element array, the offset in the first value, and length in the second, or null if no tag was found.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool GetLatLong(float32[] output) cil managed
abstract member GetLatLong : single[] -> bool override this.GetLatLong : single[] -> bool

Docs.summary: Stores the latitude and longitude value in a float array.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance unsigned int8[] GetThumbnail() cil managed
abstract member GetThumbnail : unit -> byte[] override this.GetThumbnail : unit -> byte[]

Docs.summary: Returns the JPEG compressed thumbnail inside the image file, or null if there is no JPEG compressed thumbnail.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance unsigned int8[] GetThumbnailBytes() cil managed
abstract member GetThumbnailBytes : unit -> byte[] override this.GetThumbnailBytes : unit -> byte[]

Docs.summary: Returns the thumbnail bytes inside the image file, regardless of the compression type of the thumbnail image.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int64[] GetThumbnailRange() cil managed
abstract member GetThumbnailRange : unit -> int64[] override this.GetThumbnailRange : unit -> int64[]

Docs.summary: Returns the offset and length of thumbnail inside the image file, or null if either there is no thumbnail or the thumbnail bytes are stored non-consecutively.
Docs.returns: two-element array, the offset in the first value, and length in the second, or null if no thumbnail was found or the thumbnail strips are not placed consecutively.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns number of milliseconds since Jan.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool HasAttribute(string tag) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns true if the image file has the given attribute defined.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns true if the image file has a thumbnail.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig bool IsSupportedMimeType(string mimeType) cil managed

Docs.param: the string value of mime type
Docs.summary: Returns whether ExifInterface currently supports reading data from the specified mime type or not.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns true if thumbnail image is JPEG Compressed, or false if either thumbnail image does not exist or thumbnail image is uncompressed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.ExifInterfaceStreamType StreamTypeExifDataOnly = (1)

Docs.summary: Constant used to indicate that the input stream contains only Exif data.

Docs.summary: Constant used to indicate that the input stream contains the full image data.

Docs.summary: A tag used to record the offset from UTC (the time difference from Universal Time Coordinated including daylight saving time) of the time of DateTime tag.

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which contains the java.lang.Class JNI value corresponding to this type.

Docs.summary: Creates and returns a Bitmap object of the thumbnail image based on the byte array and the thumbnail compression value, or null if the compression type is unsupported.
